actions.text: Referred to the Committee on Foreign Relations.
Committee on Foreign Relations. Ordered to be reported with an amendment in the nature of a substitute favorably.
Committee on Foreign Relations. Reported by Senator Kerry with an amendment in the nature of a substitute and with an amended preamble. Without written report.
Placed on Senate Legislative Calendar under General Orders. Calendar No. 345.

official_title: A resolution commemorating the 40th anniversary of the Treaty on the Non-Proliferation of Nuclear Weapons.

summary.text:
Reaffirms Senate support for the Treaty on the Non-Proliferation of Nuclear Weapons.

Urges the President to: (1) work to achieve universal Treaty compliance; and (2) ensure that the International Atomic Energy Agency (IAEA) has the necessary resources to conduct its Treaty oversight responsibilities.

Encourages the President to work with: (1) international partners and Treaty states to promote the Model Additional Protocol to all Safeguards Agreements as the global standard for safeguards and a requirement for nuclear commerce; and (2) other Treaty states to strengthen compliance and enforcement mechanisms and develop collective responses in the U.N. Security Council and other multilateral fora to any notification of Treaty withdrawal.

titles.title: A resolution commemorating the 40th anniversary of the Treaty on the Non-Proliferation of Nuclear Weapons.
A resolution commemorating the 40th anniversary of the Treaty on the Non-Proliferation of Nuclear Weapons.
